Script.comments: Scripts for calculating table column widths

For.D: var a = $strokeStyle.w; [ skline(a, a, $box.w - a, a), sklineTo($box.w - a, 32), sklineTo(a, 32), z ]
var a = $strokeStyle.w; [ skline(0, 32, 0, 0), sklineTo($box.w - a, 0), sklineTo($box.w - a, $box.h - a), sklineTo(0, $box.h - a), sklineTo(0, 32), sklineTo($box.w - a, 32) ]

PlainTextContent.Arg: var a = $strokeStyle.w; new Bound(a + 10, a, $box.w - 20, 32 - a);

For.D: [ skline(0, 0, $box.w, 0), sklineTo($box.w, $box.h), sklineTo(0, $box.h), z ]
var a = $strokeStyle.w; [ skline(0, 0, $box.w - a, 0), sklineTo($box.w - a, $box.h - a), sklineTo(0, $box.h - a), sklineTo(0, 0), z ]

Property.name: headerContent
Property.p:editInfo: ({targetName: 'headerText', bound: new Bound(10, 0, $box.w -10, 32), font: $textFont, align: $textAlign, multi: false})

PropertyGroup.name: Message Content

Property.name: messageContent
Property.p:editInfo: var a = $strokeStyle.w ;({targetName: 'messageClipPathRect', bound: new Bound(100 + a, 60 + a, $box.w - (120 + 2*a), $box.h - (150 + 2*a)), font: $textFont, align: new Alignment(0, 0), multi: true})

PropertyGroup.Property:
Secrevit fontes liquidum locoque pronaque?

Illas semine campoque declivia oppida corpora nam inter fuit discordia tellus solidumque iunctarum erat: quae terrenae ubi rerum recessit iudicis aestu fixo

For.D: var a = $strokeStyle.w; [ skline(a, a, $box.w - a, a), sklineTo($box.w - a, 32), sklineTo(a, 32), z ]
var a = $strokeStyle.w; [ skline(0, 32, 0, 0), sklineTo($box.w - a, 0), sklineTo($box.w - a, $box.h - a), sklineTo(0, $box.h - a), sklineTo(0, 32), sklineTo($box.w - a, 32) ]

PlainTextContent.Arg: var a = $strokeStyle.w; new Bound(a + 10, a, $box.w - 20, 32 - a);

For.Bound: var a = $strokeStyle.w; new Bound(100 + a, 60 + a, $box.w - (120 + 2*a), $box.h - (150 + 2*a))

RichTextContent.Arg: var a = $strokeStyle.w; new Bound(100 + a, 60 + a, $box.w - (120 + 2*a), $box.h - (150 + 2*a))

BoxFit.Arg: var a = $strokeStyle.w; new Bound($box.w - (137 + a), $box.h - (60 + a), 117, 40)
var a = $strokeStyle.w; new Bound($box.w - (274 + a), $box.h - (60 + a), 117, 40)

Property.name: textContent

RichTextContent.Arg: var targetBox = F.getObjectBoundingBox('text'); new Bound(20, 0, targetBox.w + 200, 16)

Property.name: textContent

RichTextContent.Arg: var targetBox = F.getObjectBoundingBox('text'); new Bound(20, 0, targetBox.w + 200, 16);

For.D: var a = $strokeStyle.w; [ skline(0, 0, $box.w - a, 0), sklineTo($box.w - a, $box.h - a), sklineTo(0, $box.h - a), z ]

BoxFit.Arg: var a = $strokeStyle.w; new Bound(10 + a, a, $box.w - (20 + 2*a), $box.h - 2*a)

For.D: var a = $strokeStyle.w; [ skline(0, 0, $box.w - a, 0), sklineTo($box.w - a, $box.h - a), sklineTo(0, $box.h - a), z ]

BoxFit.Arg: var a = $strokeStyle.w; new Bound(10 + a, a, $box.w - (36 + 2*a), $box.h - 2*a)

PropertyGroup.name: Text

Property.name: textContent
Property.p:editInfo: ({targetName: 'textClipPathRect', bound: new Bound(10, 10, $box.w - 20, $box.h - 20), font: $textFont, align: new Alignment(0, 0), multi: false})

PropertyGroup.Property:
Secrevit fontes liquidum locoque pronaque?

Illas semine campoque declivia oppida corpora nam inter fuit discordia tellus solidumque iunctarum erat: quae terrenae ubi rerum recessit iudicis aestu fixo

For.D: var a = $strokeStyle.w; [ skline(0, 0, $box.w - a, 0), sklineTo($box.w - a, $box.h - a), sklineTo(0, $box.h - a), z ]
var a = $strokeStyle.w; [ skline(0, 0, $box.w - a, 0), sklineTo($box.w - a, $box.h - a), sklineTo(0, $box.h - a), z ]
var w = $strokeStyle.w; [ skline(w, $thumbBegin.y, $box.w - w, $thumbBegin.y), sklineTo($box.w - w, $thumbEnd.y), sklineTo(w, $thumbEnd.y), z ]
var a = $strokeStyle.w; [ skline(0, 0, $box.w - a, 0), sklineTo($box.w - a, $box.h - a), sklineTo(0, $box.h - a), z ]
var w = $strokeStyle.w; [ skline($thumbBegin.x, w, $thumbEnd.x, w), sklineTo($thumbEnd.x, $box.h - w), sklineTo($thumbBegin.x, $box.h - w), z ]

Property.name: monthContent
Property.p:editInfo: ({targetName: 'month', bound: new Bound(30, 0, $box.w - 60, (($box.h - 6) / 7)), font: $textFont, align: $textAlign, multi: false})

For.D: [ skline(0, 0, $box.w, 0), sklineTo($box.w, $box.h), sklineTo(0, $box.h), z ]
var a = $strokeStyle.w; [ skline(0, 0, $box.w - a, 0), sklineTo($box.w - a, $box.h - a), sklineTo(0, $box.h - a), z ]

BoxFit.Arg: var a = $strokeStyle.w; new Bound(30 + a, a, $box.w - (60 + 2*a), (($box.h - (7 + a)) / 8));

Property.name: content
Property.p:editInfo: var size = F.elementSize('textDiv'); ({targetName: 'htmlObject', bound: new Bound(0, 0, Math.max(size.w, 80) , Math.max(size.h, 10)), font: $textFont, align: new Alignment(0, 1), multi: true})

Property.name: content
Property.p:editInfo: var box = F.getObjectBoundingBox('box') ;({targetName: 'box', bound: new Bound(0, 0, box.w, box.h), font: $textFont, align: new Alignment(0, 1), multi: true})
